poem:
Title: "The Return of the War Horse"

In the arena of our collective hearts,
The War Horse stirs once more.
Long whispers of its presence,
Trample quiet in the mind's dark theatre.
Stories embrace our gentle eyes,
In shadow of Ukraine and Gaza's throes.
While the masked boy and his loyal companion,
March again unto the uncanny echo of our applause.
